reviewText: I like Wakamatsu's social engagement and the fact that he has been questioning the status quo for decades. His films are true originals and he explores the hidden sides of human nature very effectively and provocatively. Thank goodness here is a director who forces one to THINK. Not the weak of stomach, but certainly always thought-provoking and in this stultified world no mean feat in my opinion. Enjoy the work of this highly original author!
